ygData.subject: Re: Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for the info. I just made Levl 11 and got a message that Now you will lose experience if you die or something of that nature LOL. ... be scared ...
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for the info. I just made Levl 11 and got a message that "Now
you will lose experience if you die" or something of that nature LOL.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Thunder Cat"
<Thunder_Cat_4283@h...> wrote:
> LOL, don't worry about not being able to find your body! I use to
be scared
> of the same thing, but trust me, you always find it. Besides, it
stays there
> for days, so you have a long, long time to find it and get your
stuff back.
> Just remember what zone you died in, and you will be fine. And if
you can't
> find it for some odd reason, call for a Necromancer... they have
locate
> corpse and can help you find it in no time! The only thing I worry
about
> when dying is losing experience because as you get bigger, it gets
harder
> and harder to gain any!
>
> -= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
>
